title: A terrible player who has a very offensive name towards to black people and afk after 3 mins
body:
I just played with a draven adc who had a very terrible name towards to black people, and this particular guy started to be afk after first death, and used all the rest of time to abuse thresh and other players, I am so mad about this and want to see this guy get a permanent ban.

I am not sure if I can post this guy's name, but you guys can look it up by searching my name on oce.op.gg, then you will find out this draven's name.

By the way, I just received a message that  said someone is being punished, but Riot did not say what kind of punishment has been given, will he get a permanent ban?

offensive name is just part of him for being a terrible player, he also had a very negative attitude, just 1 single death in the first 3 minutes, then he started to abuse his support thresh all the time and stopping playing, just trash talking until game ended, you can image it do you?

You reported him, and even got the notification that he was punished. You have done everything you can, and also been given proof that something was done.

Intent feeders will skip straight to a 14 day ban for first punishment, afks will face Leaver Buster and suspensions if the behaviour continues. Offensive names get a temp name and have to change it.
Lol, im a thresh main, there is a mute button for a reason... if they're being abusive hit the mute button, otherwise don't complain when they're being a %%%%
Not sure if you get the point, that Draven was afk meanwhile he was doing trash talk, and even you muted him and your team still had no adc
He probably will be made to change his name and you can watch his op.gg to see if he is banned for a certain amount of time
